import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Axios from 'axios'; import './books.css'; function Books() { const [searchKey, setSearchKey] = useState(""); const searchBook = (e) => { if(e.key === "Enter"){ Axios.get('https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q='+searchKey+'&key=AIzaSyDQ8kCRJpt7BCr2_WoshbW57wBBd_ppMFE') .then(res=> console.log(res)) .catch(err=>console.log(err)) } } return (
setSearchKey(e.target.value)} onKeyPress={searchBook}/>
{/* {/*{bookData.filter(book => book.book_id === bookId).map(filteredBook => (} */} {/*))} */}
) } {/*state={{title: filteredBook.name}}*/} export default Books
